related_post.text: ok im trying to install pocketsphinx for offline speech recognition with the sr module but when i run `pip install pocketsphinx` i get this error:``` ERROR: Command errored out with exit status 1: command: \'c:\\users\\eric\\appdata\\local\\programs\\python\\python38\\python.exe\ u c \'import sys setuptools tokenize; sys.argv[0] = \'"\'"\'C:\\\\Users\\\\Eric\\\\AppData\\\\Local\\\\Temp\\\\pipinstall7h73pob4\\\\pocketsphinx\\\\setup.py\'"\'"\'; __file__=\'"\'"\'C:\\\\Users\\\\Eric\\\\AppData\\\\Local\\\\Temp\\\\pipinstall7h73pob4\\\\pocketsphinx\\\\setup.py\'"\'"\';f=getattr(tokenize \'"\'"\'open\'"\'"\ open)(__file__);code=f.read().replace(\'"\'"\'\\r\\'"\'"\ \'"\'"\'\\'"\'"\');f.close();exec(compile(code __file__ \'"\'"\'exec\'"\'"\'))\ bdist_wheel d \'C:\\Users\\Eric\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\pipwheelxobm3kqu\' cwd: C:\\Users\\Eric\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\pipinstall7h73pob4\\pocketsphinx\\ Complete output (6 lines): running bdist_wheel running build_ext building \'sphinxbase._sphinxbase\ extension swigging deps/sphinxbase/swig/sphinxbase.i to deps/sphinxbase/swig/sphinxbase_wrap.c swig.exe python modern threads Ideps/sphinxbase/include Ideps/sphinxbase/include/sphinxbase Ideps/sphinxbase/include/win32 Ideps/sphinxbase/swig outdir sphinxbase o deps/sphinxbase/swig/sphinxbase_wrap.c deps/sphinxbase/swig/sphinxbase.i error: command \'swig.exe\ failed: No such file or directory  ERROR: Failed building wheel for pocketsphinx```
